snippet.textDisplay:
This game still holds itself very well to modern simulators. It contains tire scrub, weight transfer, snap oversteer, understeer, and a litany of other things (including great engine sounds) that GT4 missed out on.

Probably still my top favourite driving simulator.
snippet.textOriginal:
This game still holds itself very well to modern simulators. It contains tire scrub, weight transfer, snap oversteer, understeer, and a litany of other things (including great engine sounds) that GT4 missed out on.

Probably still my top favourite driving simulator.

snippet.textDisplay: This is a music that gives pure pleasure, ectasy. Speechless on how fitting is for this exquisite track. When l was young, l always hated that track, maybe due how long it was  or impatient l was but now, l grown fond of it, maybe finally l'm patient. However l can't never find the time to drive it (in games, maybe one day in real life) due duties. But l learned in this world, that the best is yet to come, meaning, that patience will get you everywhere and it will never hinder or let you go(leave you alone)

snippet.textDisplay: Enthusia is quite a bit different from your standard racer. You have to level yourself an your cars up, you cant just grind for cash and buy upgrades, everything has to be earned. By putting yourself in more challenging situations, like using "weaker" cars, you put yourself in a position to earn more XP and level up faster. Using a F1 car to race against civics wont get you much. This in turn raises your ranking, giving you access to better cars and more tracks. It is frustrating but worth it.
snippet.textOriginal: Enthusia is quite a bit different from your standard racer. You have to level yourself an your cars up, you cant just grind for cash and buy upgrades, everything has to be earned. By putting yourself in more challenging situations, like using "weaker" cars, you put yourself in a position to earn more XP and level up faster. Using a F1 car to race against civics wont get you much. This in turn raises your ranking, giving you access to better cars and more tracks. It is frustrating but worth it.

snippet.textDisplay: Ah cool, thanks for the speedy response. I'm definitely going to pick this up then, even if only for a mere dabble. You see, I've played some of the Gran Turismos and they all bored me to be honest, they aren't what I'm looking for in a racer. But this masterpiece I simply have to experience for myself. It sounds nothing like what I've heard in the GTs.

snippet.textDisplay:
huge shock, the nurburgring suite plays when you race at, you guessed it, Nurburgring.

Enthusia is a great game, on par with Grand Turismo, Massively underated.

Still great to this day, hasn't aged one bit.
